snippet: The United Nations expressed alarm Friday at the swelling tide of people fleeing their homes in northeast Nigeria to escape attacks by Boko Haram insurgents.
abstract: United Nations refugee agency expresses alarm at swelling tide of people fleeing their homes in northeast Nigeria to escape attacks by Boko Haram insurgents.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations expressed alarm Friday at the swelling tide of people fleeing their homes in northeast Nigeria to escape attacks by Boko Haram insurgents.

headline.main: U.N. Refugee Agency Says Thousands Fleeing Nigeria Region
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Villagers Cross the Border With Niger, Fleeing Attacks by Boko Haram Militants

keywords.value: United Nations High Commission for Refugees
